pageContext.claim: “When you read the things that [Omar and Talib have] said about Israel -- how bad. And if you look at their itinerary before they found out -- you take a look at their itinerary, that was all going to be a propaganda tour against Israel.”
pageContext.analysis: Omar and Talib were slated to meet number of officials and citizens around Israel, many of whom were Palestinian, but “propaganda” is a bit of a stretch. They were also set to meet with American embassy officials and nonprofits.
